content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Breaking up the frozen ground beef into small pieces as it cooks will definitely help ensure it cooks evenly and prevents large clumps from forming.

And yay for scoring great deals online! You got an amazing deal on the Instant Pot and kitchen utensils during the Amazon Prime Early Access Sale! $80 is a fantastic price for an Instant Pot, and the kitchen utensils are a great bonus. You must be thrilled to have snagged those deals!

Now, go enjoy cooking your delicious chili and putting your new Instant Pot and kitchen utensils to good use! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Happy cooking and happy shopping!
